EmailTemplate.description: AOG UPS Will Call Job Needed
EmailTemplate.name: AOG UPS Will Call Job Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: **WILL CALL JOB # NEEDED** HONEYWELL AOG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
UPS Express Critical Team,
We are working an AOG order for {!Case.Account}, shipping from CITY, STATE to CITY, STATE. We need to arrange transport billed to Honeywell account 3E4E44. Please advise Will Call Job number.
We will provide additional details after we have completed processing the order.
Thank you,
Honeywell AOG Customer Support Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
NOTE: International shipment responsibilities such as import clearance, duties, fees or taxes (if applicable), and/or any other country specific requirements are the sole responsibility of the customer/receiving party.
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
